body:
Hey!
I wanna ask is there a way to get a players cape design? For example I wanna get my friends cape design and use it. How can I get it?
body_tagged:
Hey!
I wanna ask is there a way to get a players cape design? For example I wanna get my friends cape design and use it. How can I get it?
title: Banner Cape

replies.body: if you wanna get the same cape design as someone ask for the minerneeds cool shoes link
replies.body_tagged: if you wanna get the same cape design as someone ask for the minerneeds cool shoes link

replies.body: You probably know Minecraft Skin Search. I'm asking something like that. I'll enter the username and it will give me the cape.
replies.body_tagged: You probably know Minecraft Skin Search. I'm asking something like that. I'll enter the username and it will give me the cape.

replies.body: You can't do that at the moment (try google). You can try your best to replicate it, though.
replies.body_tagged: You can't do that at the moment (try google). You can try your best to replicate it, though.
